pkgmetadata.longdescription: Specification of Generalised Linear Mixed Models // Specification of generalised linear mixed models using the 'R6' object- orientated class system. The package provides classes 'Covariance', 'MeanFunction' and 'Model', which allow for flexible specification of generalised linear mixed models, as well as functionality to produce relevant matrices, values, and analyses. See https://github.com/samuel- watson/glmmrBase/blob/master/README.md for a detailed manual.
